https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna._instruction: Enter all identifiers for this strain, excluding its ontological identifiers or RRID (e.g., identifiers from the Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) database or Rat Genome Database (RGD)).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna.label: Alternate identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna.name: alternateIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/backgro._instruction: Add the background strain that explains the majority of the genetic background and/or causes the majority of the prominent traits. If two strains contributed equally, state both.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/backgro.label: Background strain
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/backgro.name: backgroundStrain

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/breedin._instruction: Add the breeding type for this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/breedin.label: Breeding type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/breedin.name: breedingType

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a short text describing this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.label: Description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital._instruction: Add the 'Research Resource Identifier' (RRID) of this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital.label: Digital identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital.name: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/disease._instruction: Add all (human) diseases and/or conditions that this strain is a model for.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/disease.label: Disease model
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/disease.name: diseaseModel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/genetic._instruction: Add the genetic background type of this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/genetic.label: Genetic strain type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/genetic.name: geneticStrainType

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/laborat._instruction: Enter the laboratory code assigned by the Institute of Laboratory Animal Research (ILAR) for the investigator or organization that has created this strain following the defined pattern (e.g., Aaa).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/laborat.label: Laboratory code
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/laborat.name: laboratoryCode

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name of this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/phenoty._instruction: Enter a short description for the phenotype of this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/phenoty.description: Physical expression of one or more genes of an organism.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/phenoty.label: Phenotype
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/phenoty.name: phenotype

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species._instruction: Add the species of this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species.description: Category of biological classification comprising related organisms or populations potentially capable of interbreeding, and being designated by a binomial that consists of the name of a genus followed by a Latin or latinized uncapitalized noun or adjective.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species.label: Species
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species.name: species

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/stockNu._instruction: Add the stock number from the vendor the strain was supplied from/is in stock at.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/stockNu.label: Stock number
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/stockNu.name: stockNumber

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym._instruction: Enter any synonyms (including abbreviations) of this strain.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym.description: Words or expressions used in the same language that have the same or nearly the same meaning in some or all senses.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym.label: Synonym
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym.name: synonym
